title: 2 Easy Ways to Enable Blue Ticks (Read Receipts) on WhatsApp

steps.title: Open the WhatsApp app.
steps.content: Open the WhatsApp app. This looks like a white phone icon with a green background. To get blue ticks on WhatsApp, you'll need to enable Read receipts .

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It's the cog icon at the bottom right corner of the screen. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Privacy.
steps.content: Tap Privacy . You can find this underneath Account . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Toggle on "Read Receipts".
steps.content: Toggle on "Read Receipts". You may need to scroll down to find it. [3] X Research source Read receipts will be enabled. If you don't see blue ticks with a certain WhatsApp contact, this means they have their Read receipts turned off. When you message a WhatsApp contact and you both have Read receipts turned on, you will see two blue check marks when they have read your message. [4] X Research source Read receipts are always sent for group chats ; you cannot disable this feature for group chats.
